metadata.title: CVE-2021-20243 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in MagickCore/resize.c. An attacker who submits a crafted file that is processed by ImageMagick could trigger undefined behavior in the form of math division by zero. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
